job description:
Job Post Index
1F9266-Sy##

Location
East Syracuse, NY

Description:
Description
  • Perform Quality Control testing for in-process, release, stability, water, and raw material in a cGMP environment.
  • Perform other key activities such as data review, ensuring laboratory cGMP compliance is maintained, execution of technical transfer and co-validation activities, instrumentation verification/preventative maintenance
  • Assisting with laboratory investigations, writing procedures and technical documents as required
  • Providing communication of business critical information to operations and Quality Control management.

Skills:
Qualifications
  • Analytical experience using Waters HPLC, UV-Vis spectrophotometer, AKTA Explorer, and total organic carbon analyzer preferred
